title: ollama/ollama
summary: Official Ollama repo: Get up and running with Llama 3, Mistral, Gemma 2, and other large language models locally.

title: ollama-python
summary: Official Python client for Ollama; chat, embed, pull, list, push, create, copy, delete and use models.

title: ollama-js
summary: Official JavaScript/TypeScript client for Node & browsers; same features as Python client.

title: langchain-ollama
summary: LangChain integration to use any Ollama model as an LLM or embeddings provider.

title: ollama-webui
summary: Feature-rich web UI for Ollama (chat, model management, RAG, multimodal, admin).

title: ollama4j
summary: Java/Kotlin client for Ollama with sync/async APIs, embeddings, and tool-calling support.

title: ollama-rb
summary: Ruby gem for Ollama: chat, generate, pull, list, copy, delete, embeddings.

title: ollama-cli
summary: Interactive CLI wrapper with conversation history, syntax highlighting, and markdown rendering.

title: ollama-copilot
summary: VS Code extension that uses local Ollama models for inline code completion and chat.

title: ollama-vscode
summary: Another VS Code extension: sidebar chat, code generation, refactor, and explain with Ollama.

title: ollama-helm
summary: Helm chart to deploy Ollama on Kubernetes with GPU support and autoscaler.

title: ollama-docker
summary: Official Docker images (CPU & GPU) and compose examples for Ollama.

title: ollama-haystack
summary: Haystack integration to use Ollama models as generators or embedders in pipelines.

title: ollama-csharp
summary: .NET client for Ollama with chat, generate, embeddings, and streaming support.

title: ollama-rust
summary: Rust crate for Ollama: chat, generate, pull, list, embeddings, and tool calls.

title: ollama-go
summary: Unofficial Go client for Ollama (archived; community recommends ollama/ollama main repo).

title: ollama-discord
summary: Discord bot that chats with Ollama models and supports slash commands and thread context.

title: ollama-slack
summary: Slack bot using Ollama for on-demand chat and code assistance in channels/DMs.

title: ollama-rag
summary: Minimal RAG example with Ollama, LangChain, and ChromaDB for PDF Q&A.

title: ollama-gpt4all-ui
summary: GPT4All chat UI that also supports Ollama endpoints via OpenAI-compatible API.
